thread.section_title: Booking.com Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Booking.com | www.booking.com | 2 van 464
thread.title: Michael Woolley

author: Michael Woolley
title: Michael Woolley
text: Good company when it all goes well , have a problem and they don't care , booked with them for apartment in Spain and after the small print the cost went up from £220 as advertised to just over £800 , when phoned to complain their representative was very rude and argumentative and took great joy informing me that I couldn't get my £70 deposit back after being on the phone for over an hour and being put on hold for most of the time , wouldn't recommend this company to anyone and some of their prices in my opinion are misleading
